instructions.description: No operation - processor does nothing for one machine cycle
Load register pair B & C with immediate 16-bit data
Store accumulator in memory location pointed by register pair BC
Increment register pair BC by 1
Increment register B by 1
Decrement register B by 1
Move immediate 8-bit data to register B
Rotate accumulator left - each bit moves one position left, bit 7 goes to bit 0 and carry flag
No operation - processor does nothing for one machine cycle
Add register pair BC to HL - 16-bit addition
Load accumulator from memory location pointed by register pair BC
Decrement register pair BC by 1
Increment register C by 1
Decrement register C by 1
Move immediate 8-bit data to register C
Rotate accumulator right - each bit moves one position right, bit 0 goes to bit 7 and carry flag
Load register pair D & E with immediate 16-bit data
Store accumulator in memory location pointed by register pair DE
Increment register pair DE by 1
Increment register D by 1
Decrement register D by 1
Move immediate 8-bit data to register D
Rotate accumulator left through carry - each bit moves one position left, bit 7 goes to carry, carry goes to bit 0
Add register pair DE to HL - 16-bit addition
Load accumulator from memory location pointed by register pair DE
Decrement register pair DE by 1
Increment register E by 1
Decrement register E by 1
Move immediate 8-bit data to register E
Rotate accumulator right through carry - each bit moves one position right, bit 0 goes to carry, carry goes to bit 7

Move immediate 8-bit data to register L
Complement accumulator - invert all bits
